entity.name: Naijeria Toweett
entity.description: I am a software developer, product manager, and advocate for using technology to drive social good. My focus is on creating open-source solutions that empower communities, particularly women and girls, to address systemic issues such as gender-based violence and sexual violence. Through this project, I aim to provide a secure, accessible, and user-friendly platform for incident reporting and survivor support.

projects.name: Sauti Safe GBV/SV Incident Reporting App
projects.description: The GBV/Sexual Violence Incident Reporting App is an open-source platform designed to empower communities to address gender-based violence by providing a secure, anonymous, and accessible way to report incidents and streamline response workflows. The app integrates WhatsApp, a Progressive Web App (PWA), and a secure backend to ensure usability and confidentiality for survivors and organizations supporting them. This tool is being piloted with Youth Changers Kenya (YCK) and will be available for global adoption.
